These remind me of sunprints. You can still buy kits I think? I'll have to look up the cyanotype process and learn what its all about, its a new term for me.

comment.author: 39312862@N00
comment._content: Cyanotype is more commonly known as a Blueprint, like what architects and builders use in building things.
